wikipedia_page.main: Philip Fleming (15 August 1889 – 13 October 1971) was a British merchant banker and rower who competed in the 1912 Summer Olympics.

response: He was the father of Valentine Fleming and Philip Fleming. He was the grandfather of novelist Ian Fleming and writer Peter Fleming. Sir John Fleming, onetime Lord Provost of Aberdeen and later a local MP, was a younger brother.
